revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Diglett's Tunnel |image = [[File:Diglett's Tunnel.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Diglett's Tunnel. |tokens = 930,000 |location = Northeast of Route 9. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Diglett's Tunnel''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 13,215,839 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Frank || [[File:Shieldon.png|40px]] Shieldon |- | rowspan=2| [[File:Alolan Diglett.png|40px]] Alolan Diglett || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Jeff || [[File:Alolan Diglett.png|40px]] Alolan Diglett, [[File:Alolan Diglett.png|40px]] Alolan Diglett |- | [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Vaclav || [[File:Archen.png|40px]] Archen |- | rowspan=2| [[File:Nihilego.png|40px]] '''Nihilego*''' || [[File:Team Skull Grunt (female).png|40px]] Team Skull Grunt || [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans |- | [[File:Team Skull Grunt (male).png|40px]] Team Skull Grunt || [[File:Salandit.png|40px]] Salandit |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be unlocked by doing [[Quests#Ultra Beast Hunt|Ultra Beast Hunt]] Quest first.
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:7--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Larvitar.png|50px]] Larvitar || <center> 66,079,195 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |- |}
